name: Sushi Cats
description:
Choose your cat and make your way to the top!

Collect all the sushi rolls while jumping over those evil spikes...

Theme of the week: "gift a game"

Controlls

A/D    or    left/right

Credits

Game Art / Programming by: Me

Music by: Darnu-Pop

Special thanks to: Awesome Tuts for helping me out with the game programming

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
